title: Livramento
body: A populated place in the parish of Monte. The name comes from the chapel dedicated to N. S. do Livramento, which was built by Inácio Ferreira Pinto in 1684 and rebuilt a century later by João José Bettencourt de Freitas, being of vincular institution. In the same place, there is a chapel consecrated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus, built a few years ago by Father Jorge de Faria e Castro.

Inácio Ferreira Pinto: Commissioned the construction of the chapel of N. S. do Livramento
João José Bettencourt de Freitas: Rebuilt the chapel of N. S. do Livramento
Jorge de Faria e Castro: Built the chapel consecrated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus

1684: Construction of the chapel of N. S. do Livramento
